snippet: Led by Journey, the game of the year, independent studios outgunned majors for attention at the Game Developers Conference in San Francisco.
abstract: Chris Suellentrop Critic's Notebook holds that independent designers and studios, rather than big, mainstream companies, dominated the Game Developers Conference in San Francisco, as well as Game Developers Choice Awards; industry has become increasingly welcoming to independents, and digital distribution makes it easier for small companies to succeed financially.
lead_paragraph: Led by Journey, the game of the year, independent studios outgunned majors for attention at the Game Developers Conference in San Francisco.

headline.seo: Game Developers Conference Celebrates Indie Creators
headline.main: Indies Grab the Controls at a Game Conference
headline.print_headline: Indies Grab the Controls At a Game Conference
